remarks: Composition of continuous functions. ` -cn-> ` analog of ~ cnmpt11f . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2014.)
statement:
cncfmpt1f.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( CC -cn-> CC ) ) $.
cncfmpt1f.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
cncfmpt1f $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( F ` A ) ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
